ValidationRule.description: Account Names can only be edited by the System Admin Profile. This will ensure that Account Names are only updated through the integration and not by any Sales 360 users without a System Admin Profile.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISCHANGED(Name)&&
NOT(OR( $Profile.Name = "System Administrator", $Profile.Name = "System Administrator with Bulk Hard Delete", $Profile.Name = "Commercial Services Management", RecordType.Name = "Consumer Account", AND( $UserRole.Name = "GBS GMDM Management - United States", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Vendor"),
AND( $Profile.Name = "CS Management", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Distributor" ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account Name cannot be edited as Account Name is controlled by Aperity.
